attributes.action: Call for David Lammy to Resign
attributes.additional_details: sign this position to get David Lammy to Resign
attributes.background: MP's serve the people not the other way around. The people voted Out 52%. A win is a win. Some people miss out of the lottery but 4 numbers but there is no call for a redraw.

rejection.details: The UK Government and Parliament are not responsible for removing MPs from office because of their views or opinions.
